conflicts.description: flexi: Only available for Gauss-Lobatto nodes
conflicts.name: nodetype=GAUSS

conflicts.description: flexi: Only available in newer releases
conflicts.name: +to3d

dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.
dependencies.name: cmake

dependencies.description:
FFTW is a C subroutine library for computing the discrete Fourier
transform (DFT) in one or more dimensions, of arbitrary input size, and
of both real and complex data (as well as of even/odd data, i.e. the
discrete cosine/sine transforms or DCT/DST). We believe that FFTW, which
is free software, should become the FFT library of choice for most
applications.
dependencies.name: fftw

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.
dependencies.name: hdf5

dependencies.description:
Lightweight but flexible shim designed to rectify the incompatibilities
between the Accelerate/vecLib BLAS and LAPACK libraries shipped with
macOS and FORTRAN code compiled with modern compilers such as GNU
Fortran.
dependencies.name: lapack

dependencies.description: IBM MPI implementation from Spectrum MPI.
dependencies.name: mpi

dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.
dependencies.name: ninja

dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
dependencies.name: zlib-api

description:
Open Source High-Order Unstructured Discontinuous Galerkin Fluid
Dynamics Solver
name: flexi

variants.description: If set to True the code will run in two-dimensional mode
variants.name: 2d

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Enables the usage of the finite volume subcell shock capturing mechanism
variants.name: fv

variants.description: the build system generator to use
variants.name: generator

variants.description: Two different lifting methods for the parabolic part of the equation system available
variants.name: lifting

variants.description: Defines whether the parabolic part of the chosen system should be included or not
variants.name: parabolic

variants.description: Split form of the discontinuous Galerkin operator
variants.name: split
